text: Laurie Celeste Cristaldo Núñez (born 4 May 1997) is a Paraguayan footballer who plays as a centre back for Libertad/Limpeño and the Paraguay women's national team. ==International goals== Scores and results list Paraguay's goal tally first {| class="wikitable" |- ! No. !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !! title: Laurie Cristaldo
